chapters.title: Chapter 1:  Lion on the Hill
chapters.info: Lady Deira ni Ghaline t'Bashere, p. 69 (82)—Davram Bashere's wife, and Faile's mother. She is about a head taller than her husband, and is big for a woman. She has black hair. See also t'Aybara, Faile ni Bashere; t'Aybara, Zarine ni Bashere; Bashere, Davram t'Ghaline.
